item.title: Watch: Exclusive Footage of Metallica's Phantom Lord from Jon Zazula Tribute
item.description: Metallica released official footage of their performance of Phantom Lord during a tribute show for former manager Jon Zazula.

item.title: Watch: Metallica Pays Tribute to Megaforce Founders with Old-School Set
item.description: Metallica performed a special tribute show honoring Jon Zazula and his wife, Marsha, featuring songs from their first two albums.
